alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 18 at 1:21AM PDT until June 19 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Owens Valley, Olancha south to the Kern County line tonight. Entire Owens Valley on Monday. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and lower visibility possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
